name: That Super Boi.
description:
A game created during following Game Development for Modern Platforms on coursera. 

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to navigate
  • SPACE to jump
  • LEFT SHIFT to roll
  • DOWN + SPACE to fall down

Most of the awesome pixel art you can find here:

  • https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest
  • https://stealthix.itch.io/32-x-32-dungeon-assets
  • https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack
  • https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack
